description:
Mirajane tells a story from Fairy Tail`s past, thanks to Lucy accidentally finding a drawing of Natsu, Gray, Erza, Mira, Elfman and everyone else from six years ago. But wait, where`s Happy? And why is there a dragon? The story behind the birth of the mysterious flying cat, Happy, will be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu e o Ovo de Dragão!
